metadata.name: Better Knife Pieces
metadata.description:
Never do the knife piece tasks again after completing them once, just like in Antibirth!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/cFocxoy.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NRAQaFv.png[/img] [u]Knife Piece 1[/u] = Spawns in the mirror room [img]https://i.imgur.com/lBd4Hve.png[/img] [u]Knife Piece 2[/u] = Spawns in the minecart room [list] [list] [*]The item pedestals originally containing them now have random items [*]The replacement occurs after completing the knife piece tasks once [/list] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SK84PpX.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫, 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/3en8OyU.png[/img] [code]4Grabs, Aether, Akad, ALADAR, Andre Doruk, Blind the Bound Demon, BrakeDude, BroskiPlays, cat,,, Firework, fly_6, Gabriel, im_tem, KitsuneMedia, kittenchilly, Kotry, lambchop_is_ok, Luigi124, Michael¿?, Mr. Cross Stoney, PixelPlz, Sillst, sinbiscuit, Soaring__Sky, Swagpillar, The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver, Thicco Catto, watchmeojo[/code]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]Preyn[/u] - For stylistic inspiration in the image gallery [u]Swagpillar[/u] - For the idea of this mod [u]All of you[/u] - For checking us out and supporting us :)[/code]
